<title level="1" right="Rules">[Casting Cantrips from a Staff](/Rules.aspx?ID=3213)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can cast a [cantrip](/Traits.aspx?ID=550) from a staff without expending any charges, heightened to the same rank as cantrips you cast.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
